sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词均含有"岸"之意。
means: bank ： 多指有一定坡度的河岸、湖岸或堤岸。
beach ： 指倾斜度小，被海、湖或河水冲刷而有沙或卵石积存的地方。
coast ： 地理学上的名词，专指被视为边界的沿海陆地的尽头。
shore ： 指紧靠大湖泊或海洋的陆地边缘或靠海的休养地。
seaside ： 尤指疗养地、游览地区的海边。

entry.def: A bank is an institution where people or businesses can keep their money.

example.ex: Which bank offers you the service that best suits your financial needs?...
example.tran: 哪家银行提供的服务最适合您的理财需求？
我在银行有1万英镑的存款。

entry.def: A bank is a building where a bank offers its services.
entry.tran: 银行营业厅；银行办事处

entry.def: If you bank money, you pay it into a bank.

example.ex: Once you have registered your particulars with an agency and it has banked your cheque, the process begins.
example.tran: 一旦在某个代理行登记了详细信息并由它将支票存入银行，这一程序就开始了。

entry.def: If you bank with a particular bank, you have an account with that bank.
entry.tran: 与（银行）有业务来往；在（银行）有账户

example.ex: My husband has banked with the  Co-op since before the war.
example.tran: 我丈夫自战前以来就在合作银行有户头。

entry.def: You use bank to refer to a store of something. For example, a blood bank is a store of blood that is kept ready for use.

example.ex: ...Britain's National Police Computer, one of the largest data banks in the world.
example.tran: 英国国家警务计算机系统，世界上最大的数据库之一

entry.def: If you say that the cost of something will not break the bank, you mean that it will not cost a large sum of money.
entry.tran: 斥巨资；花费大笔的钱；倾家荡产

example.ex: Prices starting at £6 a bottle won't break the bank.
example.tran: 每瓶6英镑的起价不算太贵。

entry.def: The banks of a river, canal, or lake are the raised areas of ground along its edge.

example.ex: ...30 miles of new developments along both banks of the Thames.
example.tran: 泰晤士河两岸30英里的新开发区

example.ex: ...an old warehouse on the banks of a canal.
example.tran: 运河河畔的一座旧仓库

entry.def: A bank of ground is a raised area of it with a flat top and one or two sloping sides.

example.tran: 懒洋洋地躺在草埂上休息

entry.def: A bank of something is a long high mass of it.

example.ex: On their journey south they hit a bank of fog off the north-east coast of Scotland.
example.tran: 南行途中，他们在苏格兰东北海岸外遭遇了大雾。

entry.def: A bank of things, especially machines, switches, or dials, is a row of them, or a series of rows.
entry.tran: （尤指机器、开关、仪表的）（一）排，（一）组

example.ex: The typical laborer now sits in front of a bank of dials.
example.tran: 现如今，工人通常都是坐在一排仪表前。

entry.def: When an aircraft banks, one of its wings rises higher than the other, usually when it is changing direction.
entry.tran: （通常指飞机在改变方向时）倾斜飞行

example.ex: A plane took off and banked above the highway in front of him.
example.tran: 一架飞机起飞后在他前方的公路上空侧飞转向。

means.word_mean: 1. a financial institution that accepts deposits and channels the money into lending activities;

sentences.sentence: "he cashed a check at the bank"
"that bank holds the mortgage on my home"

means.word_mean: 2. sloping land (especially the slope beside a body of water);

sentences.sentence: "they pulled the canoe up on the bank"
"he sat on the bank of the river and watched the currents"

means.word_mean: 3. a supply or stock held in reserve for future use (especially in emergencies)
4. a building in which commercial banking is transacted;

sentences.sentence: "the bank is on the corner of Nassau and Witherspoon"

means.word_mean: 5. an arrangement of similar objects in a row or in tiers;
6. a container (usually with a slot in the top) for keeping money at home;
8. the funds held by a gambling house or the dealer in some gambling games;

sentences.sentence: "he tried to break the bank at Monte Carlo"

means.word_mean: 9. a slope in the turn of a road or track; the outside is higher than the inside in order to reduce the effects of centrifugal force
10. a flight maneuver; aircraft tips laterally about its longitudinal axis (especially in turning);

sentences.sentence: "the plane went into a steep bank"
"the pilot had to bank the aircraft"

means.word_mean: 3. do business with a bank or keep an account at a bank;

sentences.sentence: "Where do you bank in this town?"

means.word_mean: 4. act as the banker in a game or in gambling
7. cover with ashes so to control the rate of burning;

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English : from Old Norse bakki, of Germanic origin; related to bench. The senses 'set of similar things in sloping rows' and 'tier of oars' are from French banc, of the same ultimate origin
late 15th cent. (originally denoting a money dealer's table): from French banque or Italian banca, from medieval Latin banca, bancus, of Germanic origin; related to bank and bench

sentences.en: The Asian Development Bank says AsiaAsia's growth this year is expected to fall to 3.4 %.

sentences.cn: 19注: 中共外汇储备统计原系将[国家外汇库存]与[中国银行外汇结存]一并列入计算标准,1992年下半年.
sentences.en: Note: Since half of 1992, figures have included the foreign exchange position of Bank of China.

sentences.cn: 雪靠墙堆积起来了。
sentences.en: The snow had banked up against the wall.

sentences.cn: 顶部是2英寸厚的牛奶泡沫,沫子已经溢出杯口, 好似白雪一样,堆积在一起.
sentences.en: The top is two inches of milk foam, edging past the brim like a snow bank.

sentences.cn: 飞机向左作高度倾斜飞行。
sentences.en: The plane banked steeply to the left.

sentences.cn: 飞行员试图使飞机倾斜飞行.
sentences.en: The pilot attempted to bank the airplane.

sentences.cn: 在银行开账户时,你要填一份双联式表格.
sentences.en: You are required to complete a form in duplicate when opening an account in a bank.

sentences.cn: 我在银行有1万英镑的存款。
sentences.en: I had £10,000 in the bank.

sentences.cn: 银行存款 、 不动产 、 股票及其它财产均能共同拥有.
sentences.en: Bank accounts, properties, shares and other assets can be owned jointly.

sentences.cn: 存单固定期间投资在银行的短期中期存款.
sentences.en: Certificate of Deposit A short to medium term investment held in a bank for a specifiedtime.

sentences.cn: 银行存款三厘息.
sentences.en: The bank allows 3 percent interest on deposits.

sentences.cn: 男人:我想开一个银行存款帐户.
sentences.en: Id like to open a bank account.

sentences.cn: 该公司的银行存款业务得到联邦存款保险公司最大程度的担保.
sentences.en: This company's bank deposIt'service obtains the Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation greatest degree guarantee.

sentences.cn: 我授权我存款的银行代我付税.
sentences.en: I have commissioned my bank to pay my taxes.

sentences.cn: 银行提供较高的利率诱使更多的存款人.
sentences.en: That bank is offering higher rates of interests to tempt more depositors.

sentences.cn: 任何人在银行开了活期存款户头时, 他就是把钱借给了银行,但他可以随时提取这些钱, 或者以现金的方式, 或者开一张款子付给别人的支票.
sentences.en: When anyone opens a current account at a bank, he is lending the bank money, repayment of which he may demand at any time, either in cash or by drawing a cheque in fevour of another person.

sentences.cn: 存款人是指将钱存入银行的人.
sentences.en: A depositor is a person who deposits money in a bank.

sentences.cn: 自4月底以来, 中国央行已两度上调基准贷款利率和银行存款准备金比率.
sentences.en: Since late April, China's central bank has twice raised benchmark lending rates and bank reserve requirements.

sentences.cn: 她的银行存款还有一大笔金额.
sentences.en: She has a large sum standing to her credit in the bank.

sentences.cn: 我在那家银行有个储蓄存款的户头.
sentences.en: I have a checking account at the bank.

sentences.cn: 我的银行存款余额不多了.
sentences.en: My bank balance isn't very large.

sentences.cn: 目前,监管机构正设法通过提高银行存款准备金率来关闭信贷闸门.
sentences.en: Now regulators are trying to stem the lending by increasing bank reserve requirements.

sentences.cn: 为了控制信贷增长,有理由进一步提高银行存款准备金率.
sentences.en: Further increases to bank reserve requirements make sense in order to constrain the growth of credit.

sentences.cn: 史密斯在中央银行存款一万美元.
sentences.en: Smith banked $ 1 0 0 0 0 at the Central Bank.

sentences.cn: 鲍勃从银行取出存款去买自行车.
sentences.en: Bob took his savings out of the bank to buy a bicycle.

sentences.cn: 我在这银行开了储蓄存款帐户.
sentences.en: I have a savings account at that bank.

sentences.cn: 在宏观政策中, 可能采取的手段就是下调存款准备金利率.
sentences.en: Possibly the macroscopic policy, the method which adopts is cuts the bank against deposits interest rate.

sentences.cn: 他从银行取出存款.
sentences.en: He withdrew his savings from the bank.

sentences.cn: 很有代表性地,他们同样投资于中央银行, 持有债券, 持有美元,同时持有银行存款.
sentences.en: They have typically invested along similar lines to central banks, holding bonds, dollars and bank deposits.

sentences.cn: 我们每个月都会寄给你银行结算单, 你自己就可以查对存款的结余.
sentences.en: We'll send you the bank statement monthly, and you can check the balance yourself.

sentences.cn: 银行的关闭会给存款人导致不便.
sentences.en: The closing of the bank will entail inconvenience on the army of depositors.

sentences.cn: 银行因他已无存款而拒绝承兑他的支票.
sentences.en: The bank dishonored his check because he had no money in the bank.

sentences.cn: 银行存款证明上存款人姓名必须和经济担保人姓名一致.
sentences.en: The name on bank statement must be the same with the name of the sponsor.

sentences.cn: 这句话就是说中央银行把存款准备金率降低了0.5个百分点.
sentences.en: The central bank also reduced the proportion of deposits aside as reserves by 0.5 percentage point.

sentences.cn: 起码按照同期银行活期存款利息返还.
sentences.en: At least according to the same period the return of bank interest on demand deposits.

sentences.cn: 修房 、 度假和其他开销使她在银行的存款所剩无几.
sentences.en: House repairs, holidays and other expenses reduced her bank balance to almost nothing.

sentences.cn: 我宁愿把我的孩子们的脸上有色彩比投入的银行存款.
sentences.en: I had rather put some colour into my children's faces than put money into the bank.
